title: The Search for King Solomon's Mines  for Commodore 64
material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette & cover in clear plastic cassette case
brief_description: The Search for King Solomon’s Mines [computer game] for Commodore 64. The Search for King Solomon’s Mines is a single-player text adventure for the Commodore 64. It is the first part of a two part graphic adventure and allows for saving of the adventure for pauses during play.
